titles.title: Recognizing the 110th anniversary of the American Association for Cancer Research, the world's first and largest professional organization dedicated to the conquest of cancer.
Recognizing the 110th anniversary of the American Association for Cancer Research, the world's first and largest professional organization dedicated to the conquest of cancer.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Recognizes the 110th anniversary of the American Association for Cancer Research (AACR).
Expresses confidence that the AACR will honor its distinguished history by continuing to advance scientific progress in the fight against cancer.
